title.rendered: Employees Recognized for 25 Years of Service

content.rendered:
On September 13, the district recognized long-standing employees at a 25 years of service reception.  To acknowledge their commitment to our district, each employee received a certificate and chose a book to be placed in a school building library.

Congratulations to the following employees:

  • Suzanne Barrett​
  • Jennifer Eversole​
  • Erin Kelly ​
  • Shirley Neander
  • John Roark​
  • Charles Tanzer, Jr.​
  • Edward Vidnansky​
  • Kate Winslow
